## Upload Data from CDC - BRFSS data (2016)

```{r cars}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(plyr)


# count of observations per county code
data_grouped <- data %>% 
  group_by(X.MMSA, MMSANAME) %>% 
  tally()

data_grouped <- data_grouped %>% 
  rename(fips = X.MMSA)
```
